title: White screen when connecting to VNC
author: KPiiG
body_snippet:
Good evening Gentlemen, maybe this problem has already been solved, but I'm having problems, I downloaded the developer version and compiled it, but when I try to enter vnc I get a white screen and the remote area doesn't appear, could you help me? follow photo
![Screenshot_2](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/96506176/147626863-faff5f23-e459-42ac-9fd3-8dc0c078baf2.png)

comments.author: farosch
comments.snippet: Pretty sure we cannot fix this as the VNC library we use is no longer maintained. #2025

comments.author: robertpopa22
comments.snippet: Triage refresh (P2): this issue has been inactive for a long time. Please retest on the latest build and share reproducible steps, expected vs actual behavior, and logs/screenshots. If there is no confirmation/update, maintainers can close it as stale or not reproducible.
